room_title: Escape room "Western" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in San Diego
review: Super friendly and helpful staff with a great setup. We tried the Western room and came *THIS* close to victory, but were thwarted by an oversight on some simpler puzzles. Loved it, definitely coming back to try the Science room soon!

room_title: Escape room "Western" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in San Diego
review: My husband and I did the Western room with our two kids (13 & 17) and we had a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Western" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in San Diego
review: Our group of 8 consisted of 5 adults and 3 teens. The Western Room was so funny and just perfect for our first ever escape room. Definitely stimulates teamwork. We were so excited solving each puzzle! We can't wait to book the Voodoo room next.

room_title: Escape room "Western" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in San Diego
review: Did three out of four rooms at Lockdown. It was a great experience each time, and the Western theme was my favorite. The decorations are really good and authentic and add to the story. Lisa did an awesome job greeting us, getting us ready, and helping us when we got stumped. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Western" by Lockdown Escape Rooms in San Diego
review: Very nice set up. We had a great time doing voodoo and western!
